@@ -194,7 +194,7 @@ LL |     mod inner { #![repr="3900"] }
    |
    = note: #[warn(bad_repr)] on by default
    = help: valid hints include `#[repr(C)]`, `#[repr(packed)]`, `#[repr(rust)]` and `#[repr(transparent)]`
